about_the_game: Wouldn't you want to experience the joy of creating a character with a Dungeon to delve into? Introducing Dungeon Deck! Customize your character as you wish and set out to explore dungeons! Develop and modify your deck as you journey, and when you perish, continue your game rather than starting over, growing even stronger! Conquer dungeons with the combination of an immense skill tree and card-battler elements!
detailed_description: Wouldn't you want to experience the joy of creating a character with a Dungeon to delve into? Introducing Dungeon Deck! Develop and modify your deck as you journey, and when you perish, continue your game rather than starting over, growing even stronger! name: Dungeon Deck Demo
